name: Going Down (omer1615, sanemsky, Jumphur, Çağatay Sarp 'Lupius')
name_original: Going Down (omer1615, sanemsky, Jumphur, Çağatay Sarp 'Lupius')
description:
You are working 24/7 Underpaid. Unappreciated. Always in the red with a lot of debt. And it’s never enough!

You are sick of everything and everyone.

Now here is a chance to turn some tables.

And now the world is going deeper and deeper into debt as well.

To finish each level you have to go to the end of the graph and pull down the line. Use “W A S D” to move around. “Space” to jump.

You can edit the graph using the bars at the end of the chart.

To go into edit mode just press “S”

To hold the graph bars press “E” and use “W A S D” to control the bars, and press “E” to release the bar.

To exit edit mode press “Space”

To reset the chart, go to reset button at the left corner and hit “E”

There are 15 levels at total. After each level go into “Finance.exe” to see the next level.

Have fun! We know we did :D

Thank you for playing :)
